section.name: log4j version 1.1beta4 (release candidate)
section.p: Downlaod version 1.1beta4 (release candiate) including full source code, class files and documentation in TAR.GZ format or in ZIP format. You may elect to browse log4j documentation online.
This release candidate should be sanctioned as the official 1.1 release after a short period of probation.
Version 1.1b4 is the 21st major public release of log4j. It is 100% backward compatible with log4j version 1.0.x.
We also maintain a list of earlier versions of log4j for download, intended for the curious paleontologist.
Thanks to Henri Gomez, Linux users can now fetch log4j in RPM format at http://rpmized.free.fr or alternatively at ftp://ftp.falsehope.com/home/gomez/log4j/.

section.name: log4j version 1.0.4, dated 2001-01-12
section.p: Download the complete package including full source code, class files and documentation in TGZ format or in ZIP format.
Version 1.0.4 is the 20th major public release of log4j.
